docs.snippet: With the relationship between Afghanistan and Pakistan often marked by diplomatic fouls and offsides, it took a soccer match in Kabul to bring the neighbors together on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the relationship between Afghanistan and Pakistan often marked by diplomatic fouls and offsides, it took a soccer match in Kabul to bring the neighbors together on Tuesday.

headline.main: Afghanistan-Pakistan Soccer Match Bright Point in Tumultuous History

docs.snippet: Arsenal's Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain will be out for at least six weeks with a knee injury, manager Arsene Wenger said on Tuesday, easing fears the England winger could be set for an even longer spell on the sidelines....

docs.snippet: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, pro...
docs.lead_paragraph: With a motive that's both chilling and simple — to break up the boredom of an Oklahoma summer — three teenagers randomly targeted an Australian collegiate baseball player who was attending school in the U.S. and killed him for fun, prosecutors said Tuesday as they charged two of the boys with murder.

headline.main: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player
headline.print_headline: 3 Teens Charged in Death of Australian Player

docs.snippet: In excavations outside Rome, at the site of the city-state Gabii, archaeologists think they are catching a glimpse of Roman tastes in monumental architecture 300 years before the Colosseum....
docs.lead_paragraph: In excavations outside Rome, at the site of the city-state Gabii, archaeologists think they are catching a glimpse of Roman tastes in monumental architecture 300 years before the Colosseum.
docs.abstract: Archaeologists conducting excavations at site of ancient city-state of Gabii, outside Rome, have uncovered ruins of vast stone complex; discovery may show that rise of Roman monumental architecture began much earlier than previously thought, about 300 years before Colosseum.

docs.snippet: Russia’s ambitious vision for the 2014 Olympics is being built around the perimeter of a century-old cemetery....
docs.lead_paragraph: Russia’s ambitious vision for the 2014 Olympics is being built around the perimeter of a century-old cemetery.
docs.abstract: Russia’s ambitious vision for the 2014 Olympic Games is being built around the perimeter of a century-old cemetery, filled with Old Believers, from a purist sect of the Orthodox Church; this solemn place, unmoved by the surrounding chaos, is protected by Russian law.

headline.main: Cemetery Left in Peace in City Remade by Olympics

docs.snippet: Broncos linebacker Von Miller received a six-game suspension under the NFL's substance-abuse policy Tuesday, taking away the best defensive player from a team many expect to make a run at the Super Bowl....
docs.lead_paragraph: Broncos linebacker Von Miller received a six-game suspension under the NFL's substance-abuse policy Tuesday, taking away the best defensive player from a team many expect to make a run at the Super Bowl.
